description:
Hit that box jump or sprint to the finish, feeling good about your support. However you train, the Wild Trails is Patagonia’s most supportive sports bra. Combining a racerback with an adjustable chest band, you get a personalized fit and comfortable compression.

  • Soft recycled polyester and spandex blend wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • HeiQ® Pure antimicrobial treatment reduces odours
  • miDori™ bioSoft finish improves wicking and softness
  • Racerback design maximizes support
  • Adjustable band allows you to find your perfect fit
  • Full moulded front panel provides more support for larger cup sizes
  • High-impact support for B/C cup sizes
  • Mid-impact support for D+
name: Patagonia Wild Trails Sports Bra - Women's
